term.title: diamagnetic

item.text: Substances having a negative magnetic susceptibility are diamagnetic. They are repelled out of a magnetic field.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 1077. 'Glossary of terms used in physical organic chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 1105 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466051077)

term.citation: Citation: 'diamagnetic' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.D01668

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
